Header.title: Clique the App
Header.paragraph: The new platform. Making online shopping a social event like shopping at a mall. Create a Wishlist, build your closet, shop with friends, and share with others all in the same place.

About.paragraph: On Clique we have created a platform that will allow you to visit all of your favorite stores while staying connected with your loved ones no matter where in the world you actually are. Chat, shop, and get rewarded for doing it!

Services.name: Wish List
Services.text: See something you like?  Add it to your wish list for your friends and family to buy on your birthday or holiday.

Services.name: Closet
Services.text: Keep up to date with the latest trends and show off your fashion to your friends.  When you purchase anything you can now put it in your closet for your friends to see.

Services.name: Messaging
Services.text: Stay connected while shopping anywhere at any time.  Message, voice chat, or video chat with your friends and family to help you know what to get next.

Services.name: Rewards
Services.text: You can do your regular shopping, but get rewarded for it! The more you shop the more chances you will get to win.

Services.name: Posts
Services.text: Can’t decide what to get or simply have something to say?  Go ahead and let everyone know.

Services.name: Join Friends
Services.text: Make sure that you join your friends’ cliques.  Stay up to date with what they are doing.

Features.title: Social Shopping
Features.text: Buy your favorite things from your favorite stores with your favorite friends and family members. The new way to shop!

Features.title: Wish List
Features.text: See something you like? Add it to your wish list for your friends and family to buy on your birthday or holiday.

Features.title: Rewards
Features.text: You can do your regular shopping, but get rewarded for it! The more you shop the more chances you will get to win.

Features.title: Clique Profile
Features.text: Create a profile and join Cliques with your friends. See the wish lists and closets of whoever is in your Clique.
